pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz
  • Graphics: GTX 800 series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
